com.netflix.spectator.stateless

Interface StatelessConfig

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.netflix.spectator.api.RegistryConfig

    public interface StatelessConfig
extends com.netflix.spectator.api.RegistryConfig
    Configuration for stateless registry.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default int batchSize()
      Returns the number of measurements per request to use for the backend.
      default java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> commonTags()
      Returns the common tags to apply to all metrics.
      default java.time.Duration connectTimeout()
      Returns the connection timeout for requests to the backend.
      default boolean enabled()
      Returns true if publishing is enabled.
      default java.time.Duration frequency()
      Returns the frequency to collect data and forward to the aggregation service.
      default java.time.Duration meterTTL()
      Returns the TTL for meters that do not have any activity.
      default java.time.Duration readTimeout()
      Returns the read timeout for requests to the backend.
      default java.lang.String uri()
      Returns the URI for the aggregation service.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.netflix.spectator.api.RegistryConfig

        gaugePollingFrequency, get, maxNumberOfMeters, propagateWarnings

    • Method Detail

      • enabled

        default boolean enabled()
        Returns true if publishing is enabled. Default is true.

      • frequency

        default java.time.Duration frequency()
        Returns the frequency to collect data and forward to the aggregation service. The default is 5 seconds.

      • meterTTL

        default java.time.Duration meterTTL()
        Returns the TTL for meters that do not have any activity. After this period the meter will be considered expired and will not get reported. Default is 15 minutes.

      • connectTimeout

        default java.time.Duration connectTimeout()
        Returns the connection timeout for requests to the backend. The default is 1 second.

      • readTimeout

        default java.time.Duration readTimeout()
        Returns the read timeout for requests to the backend. The default is 10 seconds.

      • uri

        default java.lang.String uri()
        Returns the URI for the aggregation service. The default is http://localhost:7101/api/v4/update.

      • batchSize

        default int batchSize()
        Returns the number of measurements per request to use for the backend. If more measurements are found, then multiple requests will be made. The default is 10,000.

      • commonTags

        default java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> commonTags()
        Returns the common tags to apply to all metrics. The default is an empty map.
